results.content: More advanced topics will be welcomed.
Muy buena eleccion, el instructor domina el tema. Gracias
results.content_html: Muy buena eleccion, el instructor domina el tema. Gracias

results.content:
I purchased this course on sale based on the table of contents. After finishing the first section, on class-based views, it leaves somewhat to be desired.  The section on switchboard views was new to me and seems to be a technique worth investigating. Otherwise, I think it misses. 

First, the material is dated. This section was based based on Django 1.11. Django 2.x has been out for several years and Django 3.0.2 is a few months old as I write this review. Secondly, the instructor rarely does more than read their slides or the code samples. Some of the code walkthroughs are helpful, but the material lacks any explanatory depth. Finally, the "resource" was a .docx file with a single Gitlab URL and nothing else. The kicker is it that the URL redirected to another Gitlab URL with a note to have the referer update the link. A few glaring typos that should be easy to fix exist as well.

Great potential; barely average execution.

results.content: I didn't really care for this course.  The topics I purchased this course for were done poorly.  The instructor just read his power point slides, and doesn't walk you through the process.
